item.title: ItsALocke.com now with added locks
item.description: This blog now has some extra locks, these are in the URL bar! It took my fantastic hosters WPEngine a little longer than I would have preferred to get a modern SSL policy. Now that they have, they did it in their typically awesome fashion. You can request a free Let’s Encrypt SSL certificate from the admin dashboard, and configure how http etc should work in less than 15 minutes, and you don’t have be a web wizard to do it.
